meanings.definition: A person or thing that guzzles, especially drinks alcohol quickly and in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The party was wild with every guzzler enjoying their drinks.
meanings.sent2: The guzzler at the bar downed his beer in one gulp.
meanings.sent3: The guzzler at the party was the first to finish their drink.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the guzzler of the group, always finishing his drinks before anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The image of a guzzler chugging a bottle of beer stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A vehicle with poor fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The old truck was a guzzler, needing gas often.
meanings.sent2: My uncle's car was a guzzler, always needing more fuel.
meanings.sent3: The guzzler of a car seemed to always be at the gas station.
meanings.sent4: Driving the guzzler drained my wallet faster than expected.
meanings.sent5: The guzzler of a car seemed to always be thirsty for gas.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that consumes a large amount of something.
meanings.sent1: The factory had a guzzler that used up materials quickly.
meanings.sent2: The guzzler in the production line worked non-stop.
meanings.sent3: The guzzler machine was always hungry for more resources.
meanings.sent4: The guzzler device depleted the supplies faster than anticipated.
meanings.sent5: The guzzler machine devoured raw materials at an alarming rate.
